# wide

**Type Property**

Custom cyclic year format style that portrays a complete representation of a cyclic year.

## Declaration

```swift
static var wide: Date.FormatStyle.Symbol.CyclicYear { get }
```

## Modifying a Cyclic Year

- **abbreviated**: Custom cyclic year format style that portrays a shortened cyclic year.
- **narrow**: Custom cyclic year format style that portrays the shortest representation of a cyclic year.
